item.title: Webinar: Veeam integration with VMware vSAN, vSphere tags and SPBM policies
item.description:
Warning: Shameless self promotion ahead! November 30th I’ll be joining Martin Plesner-Jacobsen from Veeam for a Live Webinar:Â _Veeam integration with VMware vSAN, vSphere tags and SPBM policies. _ Now that’s a lot of goodies in one place!
Click on the banner above to register now, and reserve your spot!
